meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the pyrolyzate under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: The factory released pyrolyzate into the air during the production process.
meanings.sent3: The pyrolyzate seemed to dance in the flames as it was formed.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds billowed like pyrolyzate rising from a fire.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the pyrolyzate lingered in the room long after the experiment.

meanings.definition: To produce a pyrolyzate through heating.
meanings.sent1: The chemist will pyrolyzate the organic material to extract useful compounds.
meanings.sent2: If you heat the plastic, it will pyrolyzate and release harmful fumes.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally pyrolyzated the sugar, creating a burnt mess in the pan.
meanings.sent4: The intense heat caused the wood to pyrolyzate, leaving behind only ash.
meanings.sent5: The campfire slowly pyrolyzated the logs, turning them into glowing embers.
